title: Wyndham Vacation Rentals offers grand prize winning chance to travellers
text:
HOTEL NEWS » Wyndham Vacation Rentals offers grand prize winning chance to travellers Wyndham Vacation Rentals offers grand prize winning chance to travellers   
If you have plans to hit the road this summer, make sure you’re on the Road to Happiness by entering a month-long sweepstakes offered by Wyndham Vacation Rentals, the world’s largest professional manager of vacation rental properties and part of the Wyndham Worldwide family of brands. 


The sweepstakes kicked off from June 29 and will run through July 31 in celebration of National Vacation Rental Month. National Vacation Rental Month is observed during July because it is the most popular time of year for travelers to enjoy this type of accommodation. Throughout the month, vacation rentals are recognized as a better way to get away with more space, privacy and in-home amenities like kitchens and living rooms. 


“Vacation rentals and road trips can go hand in hand. In fact, nearly 90 percent of vacation rental travelers are planning to take a road trip this summer,” said Mary Lynn Clark, president of Wyndham Vacation Rentals North America. “We wanted to offer travelers a chance to win this quintessentially American form of travel with our Road to Happiness Sweepstakes. It’s very easy to register for a chance to win the grand prize, and there will be a fun, new social media challenge every day for the opportunity to earn road trip and travel-themed daily prizes.” 


The grand prize, valued at more than $6,000 USD, includes a Wyndham Vacation Rentals voucher, a car rental from Avis, a gas card, a mountable camera, and a cooler for road trip snacks. Daily prizes include road trip and vacation themed gifts like a Budget car rental, a DSLR camera, sunglasses, Wyndham Vacation Rentals vouchers and a Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 Nook, among others. 

To enter, follow these easy steps: 
1. Visit RoadtoHappySweeps.com. 
2. Enter for a chance to win grand prize in one easy step. 
3. Participate in daily social media challenges for a chance to win fun daily prizes. (Optional) 
4. Share the sweepstakes with your friends and family for additional entries for the grand prize. (Optional) 

While you wait to hear if you won the grand prize vacation, you can celebrate National Vacation Rental Month by staying in a vacation rental of your own. Right now, Wyndham Vacation Rentals is offering some great travel deals in locations like Charleston and Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, the Gulf Coast of Alabama, Delaware’s beaches, the Smoky Mountains, and destinations in Florida.
